name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Moncton

reviews.text: We stayed recently in one of the suites which was really nice because it has it's own private entrance but a little pricey. The parking is free and it's close to shopping. The bedroom was a little cramped but was nicely decorated.Overall it was very clean. Staff was friendly and there is a decent breakfast in the morning of eggs,bacon and cereals .The pool we found was really crowded and heavily chlorinated so you couldn't be in the room long. Good location,clean and comfortable will stay again.
reviews.title: clean and comfortable

reviews.text: Stayed here 1 night with my family after a day at Magic Mountain. Kids enjoyed the pool. The air condioning was nice as it was quite warm outside. The beds were comfortable and we had a nice sleep. Location is close to all attractions, you can see Crystal Palace from the parking lot. The room was clean and the hot breakfast in the morning was very good. Would definatly stay here again and would recommend this hotel. The front desk staff was helpful giving me directions to Parlee Beach at check out.
reviews.title: Nice Clean Freindly Hotel..Good Breakfast

reviews.text: Stayed here for a few days for work. Rooms are clean and comfy. Staff wasn't overly friendly. Included breakfast is not very good. I prefer the Marriott but that's just me.
reviews.title: It's ok. Nothing special.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a really nice hotel with great bilingual staff to greet you: the rooms are very clean and the bed quite comfortable. Parking is free; there is a pool as well as a work out room in the 3 storey hotel.
reviews.title: Very clean with great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A free warm breakfast is included ( pancakes, sausage, bacon, etc ) which helps to prepare you for the day. Highway connections are right there and the hotel is located across the highway from Crystal Palace. There is also a computer terminal in the lobby with free access.
reviews.title: Our suite was very compact

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went there march 31 and stayed one night , it was supose to be 2 queen beds and it was 2 double , we only notice when it was time to go to bed that the beds were small , so we slept in different beds and in my ice bucket there was a bottle of liquor so thats when we notice there was nobody that clean the ice bucket and they were more things that i want say because probably it never happens and we were just the unlucky ones but i seen better and i didn't no were to make my complaint so thats why i did it on this website , my name is Renaud and if manager wants to call me on my cell its 506-424-0240 , thank you and sorry for the bad review but that was my case
reviews.title: could of been better

reviews.text: Nothing special and almost a little too pricey for what you get but I find Moncton very overpriced for the value and quality of the hotels in the city. The property and room were clean but very spartan and utilitarian. One of the new "cookie cutter" BW designs.
reviews.title: Nice Clean Simple Hotel

reviews.text: Good breakfast, nice small pool.
reviews.title: A very pleasant stay.....

reviews.text: Staff were very friendly and helpful. I would rate this a 3.5 out of 5, but Tripadvisor does not give that option so I fall to a 3 - just an average property.
reviews.title: very good
Greatest "bang" for your buck! :)
reviews.text: Booked at the last minute.... very friendly staff, clean room and very comfortable bed. There was only a shower in our bathroom, no tub but it was a terrific shower. Very good breakfast included.

this is the only place to stay. I cannot understand why people complain about their children getting chased out of the fitness room. These people are the first ones that would call a lawyer if their child fell. Good for the staff for handling the situation before your child got hurt.
reviews.title: Perect place to crash

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff here are excellent and always go out of their way to assist travellers.
reviews.title: A few shortfalls but the staff made up for it. 2nd time a charm

reviews.text: I would not even consider staying anywhere else.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: 10 on 10 to them
reviews.title: Expected more

reviews.text: Stayed here on our way to the Maritimes. We got in late so we had the last room but it was as reserved. The problem was that the electronic key did not work... The evening guy (Martin) was very gracious, excused the hotel and was helpfull in getting us in and out of the room. We were refered to a take out pizza place called Pagano. Best hotel pizza we have ever had. The next morning at checkout we got a rebate on our rate. Thanks.
reviews.title: Where is the china

reviews.text: We stayed here for a weekend and it was nothing by harrassment by the front counter staff and management. They chased people up and down the halls, throughout the building, threatening to contact the police if you left your door ajar, and were rude and terrible to the guests. I will never stay here again.
reviews.title: The staff here are awful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In 2005 when the facility was fairly new my wife enjoyed our stay at this hotel. However, in November 2012, things have apparently changed. We had a room with two Queen beds as it offered the best price online. We arrived after dark and even with all the lights turned all the lighting was dim enough that it was hard to get a handle on the cleanliness or the room. However, upon examining the bathroom, it was bright and appeared to be clean.
reviews.title: Apparently Things Have Changed in Five Years

reviews.text: However, what really turned us off this place was that the mattress does not have a full protective cover - just a pad under the bottom sheet but which doesn't completely cover the bottom sheet . Before morning, parts of the mattress were bare at the edges. Moreover, the comforter serves as the main blanket which means that without the comforter on the bed you are going to be cold. Also, a good look the next morning in the daylight revealed that, in our opinion, the comforter needed to be cleaned! (In addition to the usual double sheets, every hotel/motel bed should have a blanket which is changed for cleaning with the sheets each time the room is cleaned!
reviews.title: Nice place, Good location

reviews.text: This is a very pleasant place to stay in the Moncton area.
reviews.title: Nice looking hotel close to the airport

reviews.text: The room was clean and comfortable pretty much the same as many other Best Westerns I have stayed in. The desk staff were extremely friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Nice and Clean

aka: Best Western Plus Moncton Hotel Moncton
